name: Release 0.6.8
body:
## What's Changed
* Make JMH compatible with Gradle 8.0 by @donat in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/226

## New Contributors
* @donat made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/226

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/compare/RELEASE_0_6_7...RELEASE_0_6_8

name: Release 0.6.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Add ability for benchmarkMode to have multiple modes by @steppinrazor in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/62
* Fix NPE in benchmark mode list processing by @vyazelenko in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/66
* Duplicate dependencies handling and other improvements by @vyazelenko in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/67
* Remove unused method by @steppinrazor in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/68
* Fixes for #73 and update to Gradle 2.13 by @vyazelenko in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/74
* Split multiple profiles into distinct arg entries. Fixes #72 by @aalmiray in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/75
* Restore publishRelease task by @vyazelenko in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/77
* Fixes #84 by @reinhapa in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/85
* Upgrade to Gradle 4.0 by @melix in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/96
* Separate generate resources and classes by @wolfs in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/129
* Feature/update default jmh version by @imanushin in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/120
* Additional unit tests for options by @surfing in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/139
* Bug: jmh timout option cannot be set by @surfing in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/138
* Reduce the impact of realizing tasks when using the JMH plugin by @big-guy in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/136
* space after error count by @a10y in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/144
* fix: run GC after Runner finished by @grv87 in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/145
* Fixed shadow functional tests by @krezisky in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/142
* Fix typo by @izeye in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/147
* Build an über jar using the standard jar plugin. by @pivotal-jbarrett in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/154
* Fix file descriptor leak through worker classpath by @oehme in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/173
* Bump jmh version by @ocadaruma in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/171
* Fix the plugin and its task to support Gradle's configuration cache by @eskatos in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/176
* Make the "download" badge point to the plugin portal by @martinbonnin in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/178
* Extend and improve GitHub workflow by @joschi in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/182
* Point gradle plugin portal badge in README to updated coordinates by @aegershman in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/184
* Use JavaExec for JmhBytecodeGeneratorTask by @oehme in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/185
* Updated Gradle to latest final 7.0.2 release by @reinhapa in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/193
* Update out-dated parameter names in README by @ikhoon in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/191
* Fix error message for unsupported Gradle versions by @joschi in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/188
* Bump Spock to stable release by @MariusVolkhart in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/195
* Fix a bug where benchmarkParameters are not respected by @jrhee17 in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/201
* Add dependency on `compileTestJava` if `includeTests=true` by @joschi in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/205
* Delete stale JMH classes before producing new ones by @MariusVolkhart in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/202
* Combine JVM arguments with a space in-between by @msridhar in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/198
* Modify Kotlin functional test to use internal code by @MariusVolkhart in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/196
* Fix references to default results location by @eatdrinksleepcode in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/215
* Replace `setMain` by `getMainClass.set` to support future Gradle 8.0 by @bric3 in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/219
* Adds environment variables by @bric3 in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/212
* Bump JMH to 1.35 by @bric3 in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/210
* update samples to version 0.6.6 by @sullis in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/223
* Remove outdated warning around Groovy version by @jonnybot0 in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/221

## New Contributors
* @steppinrazor made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/62
* @aalmiray made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/75
* @reinhapa made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/85
* @melix made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/96

* @grv87 made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/145
* @krezisky made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/142
* @izeye made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/147
* @pivotal-jbarrett made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/154
* @oehme made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/173
* @ocadaruma made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/171
* @eskatos made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/176
* @martinbonnin made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/178
* @joschi made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/182
* @aegershman made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/184
* @ikhoon made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/191
* @MariusVolkhart made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/195
* @jrhee17 made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/201
* @msridhar made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/198
* @eatdrinksleepcode made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/215
* @bric3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/219
* @sullis made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/223
* @jonnybot0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/melix/jmh-gradle-plugin/pull/221
